group_1.textCenter: (I don’t feel anything abnormal, though this@was where the water leaked.)
(The third floor seems normal too... Let’s head@to the fourth.)

group_1.textRight: It’s the Witch’s Labyrinth... [chara:301701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301701:cheek_0][chara:301701:motion_200:eyeClose_0][chara:301701:lipSynch_1]In I go!!

group_1.textCenter: (This entire Labyrinth is filled with overwhelming@amounts of magical power.)
(No familiars are attacking me yet... Did this@Witch set up traps?)
Lucky for me, then. ...But there is still something@that I want to investigate.
(I knew it... There's something besides the@Witch deeper inside.)
(This magical reaction is weak, but it certainly@feels familiar...)

group_1.textLeft: It’s been a while, Yukika.

group_1.textRight: How many months has it been...?

group_1.textLeft: It's no wonder that you'd be surprised.
For months, we've been blocked by the barrier@around Kamihama City.
There was no way for us to enter the city.
During the catastrophe brought about by the@Wings of the Magius...
That barrier temporarily disappeared.
So, I took that opportunity to enter Kamihama,@and now here I am.
...But soon enough, that barrier returned.

group_1.textRight: So you were stranded in here...?

group_1.textLeft: That is what it means, yes.

group_1.textRight: So, you've been in Kamihama this entire time@since then...?

group_1.textLeft: It hasn't been long enough to describe it as@'this entire time,' has it?
Apart from today, I have refrained from@interfering.
From all of your perspectives, I may as well not@have been here.

group_1.textRight: Did you just say “apart from today”?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: Kyubey, you... What did you do here?

group_1.textLeft: Hm... Do you mean to say that what happened@here today...
Had some effect on your immediate vicinity?

group_1.textRight: Yes! I'm practically waist-deep in troubles now!

group_1.textLeft: So from the arcade... You were teleported to@the school?

group_1.textRight: That’s not all. I had a daydream where the old@school building collapsed.
And Miss Akatsuki’s robe was in my bag with a note,@even though I don’t remember ever putting it there.
One incident after another, as if I'd been flung@from World A to World B...

group_1.textLeft: I see.
You could say that these things are my fault,@but also aren't.

group_1.textRight: I have the right to demand an explanation,@don't I?

group_1.textLeft: That is correct, Yukika.
In short, at that time...
You're caught up in a revision to the world that@occurred in the near future.
